attributes.action: review child benefits to create a fair playing field for parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A father who sees his child the same amount of time as the mother (50 - 50 residency) must still pay the mother child benefits. How is this fair? Why don't fathers have the same rights as mothers?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
